properties.title: Zambezi At Chavuma
properties.description: Streamflow Forecasts for Zambezi At Chavuma

table:columns.name: initialization_time
table:columns.description: The initial timestamp in the forecast model which created this forecast step. All rows with the same initialization time are part of the same "forecast" and are produced at the same time.

table:columns.name: valid_time
table:columns.description: The point in time this forecast step is predicting. valid_time = initialization_time + lead_time_hours. The discharge values in this row are the average rate from this time (inclusive) until the next valid time (exclusive).

table:columns.name: lead_time_hours
table:columns.description: The number of hours ahead of the initialization time this forecast step is predicting.

table:columns.name: discharge_mean
table:columns.description: The mean of the probabilistic streamflow prediction, as an average rate across the forecast step in m³/s.

table:columns.name: discharge_median
table:columns.description: The median of the probabilistic streamflow prediction, as an average rate across the forecast step in m³/s.

table:columns.name: discharge_q0.01
table:columns.description: The quantile 0.01 of the probabilistic streamflow prediction, as an average rate across the forecast step in m³/s.

table:columns.name: discharge_q0.025
table:columns.description: The quantile 0.025 of the probabilistic streamflow prediction, as an average rate across the forecast step in m³/s.

table:columns.name: discharge_q0.05
table:columns.description: The quantile 0.05 of the probabilistic streamflow prediction, as an average rate across the forecast step in m³/s.

table:columns.name: discharge_q0.1
table:columns.description: The quantile 0.1 of the probabilistic streamflow prediction, as an average rate across the forecast step in m³/s.

table:columns.name: discharge_q0.25
table:columns.description: The quantile 0.25 of the probabilistic streamflow prediction, as an average rate across the forecast step in m³/s.

table:columns.name: discharge_q0.5
table:columns.description: The quantile 0.5 of the probabilistic streamflow prediction, as an average rate across the forecast step in m³/s.

table:columns.name: discharge_q0.75
table:columns.description: The quantile 0.75 of the probabilistic streamflow prediction, as an average rate across the forecast step in m³/s.

table:columns.name: discharge_q0.9
table:columns.description: The quantile 0.9 of the probabilistic streamflow prediction, as an average rate across the forecast step in m³/s.

table:columns.description: The quantile 0.95 of the probabilistic streamflow prediction, as an average rate across the forecast step in m³/s.

table:columns.description: The quantile 0.975 of the probabilistic streamflow prediction, as an average rate across the forecast step in m³/s.

table:columns.description: The quantile 0.99 of the probabilistic streamflow prediction, as an average rate across the forecast step in m³/s.
